titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army to provide technical assistance to local interests for planning the establishment of a regional water authority in northeastern Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 1/9/1995--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to provide technical assistance to local interests for planning and establishing a regional water authority in northeastern Ohio which addresses the water problems of the region. Limits to 75 percent the Federal share of the cost of such activities.
